scripts.clean:reports: rm -rf cypress/reports/* mochawesome-report || rmdir /s /q cypress\reports mochawesome-report
scripts.generate:report: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > cypress/reports/merged-report.json && npx mochawesome-report-generator cypress/reports/merged-report.json && cd mochawesome-report && open merged-report.html
scripts.cy:run: npm run clean:reports && npx cypress run
